short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly find & copy ID of sections and blocks in Squarespace. Supports Fluid Engine & mobile queries

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Allows to quickly find and copy IDs/classes of any SquareSpace page, section, or block.  
Activate the extension with a button in the browser panel or with a hotkey (Alt/Option).

Allows to copy ids & classes: Header | Section | Fluid Engine | Regular block | Footer

‚úÖ Supports Fluid Engine. 
‚úÖ Bigger click areas for easier copying. 
‚úÖ Hotkey activation to toggle IDs/classes.
